statements: SELECT player_name, total_items FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE total_items > 10;
SELECT player_name, total_items, total_weight FROM player_inventory ORDER BY total_weight DESC;
SELECT player_name FROM player_inventory WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT DISTINCT total_items FROM player_inventory WHERE total_weight > 100;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_items, total_weight FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_items, total_weight FROM player_inventory WHERE total_weight > 100;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_items, total_weight FROM player_inventory ORDER BY total_items DESC;
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_items, total_weight FROM player_inventory WHERE player_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT player_id, player_name, total_items, total_weight FROM player_inventory WHERE total_items BETWEEN 50 AND 100;
SELECT * FROM items;
SELECT item_name, item_rarity FROM items WHERE item_rarity='legendary';
SELECT item_name, item_description FROM items WHERE item_id=1;
SELECT * FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id=1;
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM items JOIN player_inventory ON items.item_id = player_inventory.item_id WHERE player_id=1;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_rarity = 'legendary';
SELECT item_name, item_rarity FROM items WHERE item_description IS NOT NULL;
SELECT item_name, item_rarity FROM items ORDER BY item_rarity DESC;
SELECT item_name, item_rarity, item_description FROM items WHERE item_rarity IN ('rare', 'epic') AND item_description LIKE '%awesome%';
SELECT player_id, SUM(quantity) AS total_quantity FROM player_inventory GROUP BY player_id HAVING total_quantity > 10;
SELECT player_id, player_name, currency FROM player_inventory
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM item_data
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM player_item_inventory
SELECT player_name, currency, player_id FROM player_inventory
SELECT item_category, item_name, item_description FROM item_data
SELECT player_name, currency FROM player_inventory WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM item_data WHERE item_category = 'Weapon' ORDER BY item_name DESC;
SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM player_inventory pi JOIN player_item_inventory pii ON pi.player_id = pii.player_id JOIN item_data id ON pii.item_id = id.item_id WHERE pi.player_id = 2;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM item_data WHERE item_id IN (SELECT item_id FROM player_item_inventory WHERE player_id = 3);
SELECT player_name, SUM(quantity) AS total_items FROM player_inventory pi JOIN player_item_inventory pii ON pi.player_id = pii.player_id WHERE pi.player_id = 4 GROUP BY player_name;
SELECT * FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player WHERE player_level > 5;
SELECT * FROM item WHERE item_category = 'Weapon';
SELECT player_id, player_name, item_name, quantity FROM player, inventory, item WHERE player.player_id = inventory.player_id AND inventory.item_id = item.item_id;
SELECT player_name, player_level FROM player WHERE player_level > 5 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_category FROM item WHERE item_category = 'Weapon' ORDER BY item_name DESC;

SELECT player_name, item_name, quantity FROM player JOIN inventory ON player.player_id = inventory.player_id JOIN item ON item.item_id = inventory.item_id WHERE quantity > 0 ORDER BY player_name, item_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, game_name FROM player JOIN game ON player.player_id = game.game_id WHERE player.player_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY game_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM inventory WHERE quantity BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY item_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM players;
SELECT player_id, player_name, player_level FROM players WHERE player_level > 10;
SELECT item_name, item_type, item_description FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Weapon';
SELECT player_id, item_id, quantity FROM inventory ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT player_id, item_id, transaction_timestamp FROM transactions WHERE player_id = 1001 ORDER BY transaction_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Weapon' ORDER BY item_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT item_id, item_name FROM items WHERE item_type = 'Armor' ORDER BY item_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, player_level, player_last_logged_in FROM players WHERE player_level > 50 ORDER BY player_last_logged_in DESC;

SELECT t.transaction_id, p.player_name, i.item_name, t.transaction_type FROM transactions t INNER JOIN players p ON t.player_id = p.player_id INNER JOIN items i ON t.item_id = i.item_id WHERE t.quantity > 10 ORDER BY t.transaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT e.player_id, i.item_name, e.equipped_slot FROM equipment e INNER JOIN items i ON e.item_id = i.item_id WHERE e.equipped_slot = 'Head' ORDER BY e.player_id ASC;
